r.s: class to do http requests, uses a adapter based system for performing those requests
r.d:
Please see the examples dir for basic usage
Adapters are available for based on the following code and are used in this order: PEAR2_HTTP_Request_Adapter_Http (uses the Pecl Http class) PEAR2_HTTP_Request_Adapter_Curl (based on the curl extension, not complete) PEAR2_HTTP_Request_Adapter_Phpstream (based on the http php stream code) PEAR2_HTTP_Request_Adapter_Phpsocket (based on php sockets, built from PEAR1 HTTP_Request)
